name: Adsfox – tracking Pixel
author: Adsfox

sections.description:
Advertising made easy, data-driven, measurable and GDPR-compliant. Adsfox is an online marketing platform for data-driven marketing.
With FB Tracking Pixel is it possible to track all important events for Facebook campaign optimization.

Facebook setup in 5 minutes

Configure all important events in only 5 minutes.

All important plugins supported

Activate tracking for the following plugins with only one click:

  1. WooCommerce
  2. Contact Form 7
  3. Elementor (Contact Forms)

Set up custom events

Create your own events dynamically, for example, Thank You Page tracking, or track the clicks on a phone number or email addresses.

More information

https://adsfox.com/contact
sections.installation:
Using the WordPress Admin Console

  1. Go to the ‘Plugins’ section of your WordPress Admin Console, and click on ‘Add New’.
  2. Search for “FB Tracking Pixel” and click ‘Install Now’ to install the plugin.
  3. Activate the plugin and navigate to “DDT Tracking Pixel” from the WP menu.
sections.faq:
How does the Link Facebook function work?

With Link Facebook it’s possible to get the Facebook Pixel directly by entering your Facebook login details. There is no need to change any settings in your Facebook account.

What data will be stored using the Link Facebook function?

The Facebook user ID for account access and the Access Token generated from Facebook will be stored, as well as a self-created ID to identify the request. After unlinking an account the data is deleted.

Is the tool free?

FB Tracking Pixel, as well as the Link Facebook function are free to use. This also means that any API call to Facebook from this plugin will always be free.

Where can I ask for support?

If you have any questions, visit our website and use the contact form:
https://adsfox.com/contact
